name: ClassicCocktailHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask classic cocktail helper how can i make a bellini”
”how can you make a sea breeze”
”how do I make a gimlet”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classic cocktail helper
des:
Classic cocktail helper tells you how to make some of the all time great cocktails.

85 Cocktail recipes are included, some of which are: Manhattan, Bloody Mary, Margarita, Old-Fashioned, Gin and Tonic, Screwdriver, Gimlet, Mai Tai, long island ice Tea, White Russian and Caipirinha.

To use this skill enable it. Then you can ask the following: 

what's the recipe for a margarita
how do I make a gin and tonic
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
